text:
The Life Insurance Corporation of India would conduct a campaign to recruit agents every Sunday during March and April.

The recruitment would be conducted at the LIC of India Unit-I branch at Madurai Road in the city between 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. every Sunday, according to a press release from R.Nehru, Senior Branch Manager, LIC of India, Unit-I Branch, Tiruchi.— Special Correspondent
title: LIC recruitment drive
